target_text: "It is important to also assure internal quality. Internal quality has to do with the way that the system has been built and designed."

Codebook.Definition: Emphasizes that assuring internal quality is important and should be carried out. Highlights the need to verify quality within the system.

Codebook.Code: Internal Quality Defined by Build and Design
Codebook.Definition: Defines internal quality as related to how the system has been built and designed. Focuses on construction and design aspects as the basis of quality.
